name: gandalf-mcp
description: MCP server for fantasy football data from Sleeper App
long_description:
# Gandalf Fantasy Football MCP

A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that provides fantasy football data and analytics through Sleeper APIs. Features include:

- Player information and statistics
- League management and standings
- Roster analysis and recommendations
- Draft information
- Matchup data and projections
- Trending player analysis

Perfect for fantasy football enthusiasts who want to integrate their league data with Claude Desktop.

## API Usage & Compliance

This extension follows Sleeper API best practices:
- Implements intelligent caching to minimize API calls
- Respects rate limits and usage guidelines
- Caches player data locally as recommended (refreshed daily)
- Uses appropriate User-Agent headers for identification
